dict.acceptation: (she的宾格)她；(she的所有格)她的；她，指某个国家，（一艘）船；

sent.orig: The decrease of HER-2 ECD levels may be positively correlated with the number of SKBR3 cells.
sent.trans: HER-2 ECD水平降低可能与SKBR3细胞数目减少有关。

sent.orig: I was in love with her—'was' being the operative word.
sent.trans: 在I was in love with her这句话中，was是关键词。

sent.orig: He must subdue her, absorb her, rip her apart and consume her.
sent.trans: 他立意要征服她，吞了她，不惜把她撕碎把她榨干。

sent.orig: Her children and call her blessed, her husband also and he praised her.
sent.trans: 她的孩子长大成人，称她为福音，丈夫也这样称呼她、真诚地赞誉她。

sent.orig: We lifted her to her feet and helped her to her house.
sent.trans: 我们扶她起来，把她搀到她家里。
